About

Background 15 years experience designing web products and applications Worked with startups with team of 5 to fortune 500 companies Managed a team of designers Lead teams on projects

Objective Building great products

Principles & Process Success in business means a product that people want to use. Believe in working quickly and iteratively to test new ideas, build and learn new ideas. Best summarized by leanstartup philosophy.
